Vanishing Cut.name: Vanishing Cut
Vanishing Cut.fullText:
Darkening Blade Attack 11Vanishing Cut

Your attack slashes the foe, but before it can respond, you disappear into swirling darkness.

Encounter        Illusion, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Dexterity vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you become invisible to the target until the end of your next turn


Published in Dragon Magazine 382, page(s) 70.
Vanishing Cut.flavor: Your attack slashes the foe, but before it can respond, you disappear into swirling darkness.
Vanishing Cut.range:
Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Dexterity vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you become invisible to the target until the end of your next turn
Vanishing Cut.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you become invisible to the target until the end of your next turn

Blinding Assailant.name: Blinding Assailant
Blinding Assailant.fullText:
Darkening Blade Attack 20Blinding Assailant

You strike and dance away, eluding a foe’s counterattacks even as you set up your next strike.

Daily        Illusion, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Dexterity vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you become invisible to the target (save ends).

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: You can shift 1 square. Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target moves or shifts while it is adjacent to you, it takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier, and you can shift 1 square as a free action.


Published in Dragon Magazine 382, page(s) 70.
Blinding Assailant.flavor: You strike and dance away, eluding a foe’s counterattacks even as you set up your next strike.
Blinding Assailant.range:
Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Dexterity vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you become invisible to the target (save ends).

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: You can shift 1 square. Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target moves or shifts while it is adjacent to you, it takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier, and you can shift 1 square as a free action.
Blinding Assailant.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you become invisible to the target (save ends).

Gloaming Shroud.name: Gloaming Shroud
Gloaming Shroud.fullText:
Darkening Blade Utility 12Gloaming Shroud

Light flees when shadows envelop you to whisk you to safety.

Encounter        Illusion
Free Action      Personal

Trigger: You miss with an attack

Effect: You shift 3 squares and gain concealment until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 382, page(s) 70.
Gloaming Shroud.flavor: Light flees when shadows envelop you to whisk you to safety.
Gloaming Shroud.range:
Personal

Trigger: You miss with an attack

Effect: You shift 3 squares and gain concealment until the end of your next turn.
